api_list.name: Krijg news van een specifieke news site
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://defensie.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "defensie.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Krijg al het nieuws
api_list.description: je krijgt nieuws over defensie van alle nieuws sites
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://defensie.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "defensie.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
